author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Balatro trailer to see the new collaborations in the Pack 3 update, including new cosmetic card skins inspired by characters from Divinity Original Sin 2, Shovel Knight, Potion Craft, Enter The Gungeon, Cult of the Lamb, Don't Starve, 1000xRESIST & Warframe. The Balatro: Friends of Jimbo Update 3 is now available free of charge on PC, consoles, and mobile.
title: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo (Pack 3) - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Prepare to explore mystical Norse landscapes. Check out the Vikings Dynasty announcement teaser trailer for the newest game in the Dynasty city-building action-adventure RPG franchise from developer Digital Daredevils and publisher Toplitz Productions. Vikings Dynasty will be available in Early Access on PC in late 2025.

While exploring, ravaging and pillaging are commonly associated with Viking culture and their legendary status as warring wayfarers, their family values are almost second to none. After your ship crashes on a rugged coast, you’ll find yourself lost in a large archipelago. Fend for your life against the elements and nature itself with its ever-changing environment and build a new home for yourself as well as other survivors against a beautiful backdrop of fjords and forests.
title: Vikings Dynasty - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Mirai Guardian Trailer for Star Citizen, a multiplayer space trading and combat simulation game developed by Cloud Imperium. Players can now gain access to the Guardian, Mirai’s heavy-weight fighter suitable for long-range engagements. The Guardian from Mirari is available now on Star Citizen for PC.

#StarCitizen #MiraiGuardian #Gaming
title: Star Citizen - Official Mirai Guardian Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's what to expect from Nintendo in 2025 and a look at the Nintendo 2025 games on the way next year. Soon it will be 2025, also known as the year Nintendo finally pulls back the curtain on its next console. After 2024 was filled with shaky rumors, alleged leaks, and nonstop speculation about the Nintendo Switch 2, we know for a fact Nintendo will share more about the next generation in less than 100 days. If that’s not exciting enough for you, the Nintendo Switch still has a few cards up its sleeve and 2025 will finally see the launch of Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, eight years after its initial announcement. And, as always, there will surely be some surprises along the way, with some possibly tied to Mario's 40th anniversary.

#Nintendo #Gaming #Games
title: What to Expect From Nintendo in 2025

author: IGN
description:
Storm and Captain Carter strategize their next course of action in Episode 7 of What If...? Season 3. Check out the latest action-packed Marvel Animation’s What If...? Season 3 clip for the animated series. What If…? is now streaming on Disney+, with a new episode debuting daily for eight days. 

Watch as classic characters make unexpected choices that will mutate their worlds into spectacular alternate versions of the MCU. The Watcher (voice of Jeffrey Wright) will guide viewers as the series traverses new genres, bigger spectacles, and incredible new characters. The series features a voice cast that includes a host of stars who reprise their iconic roles. Season 3 features fan-favorite characters like Captain America/Sam Wilson, The Winter Soldier/Bucky Barnes, Hulk/Bruce Banner, The Red Guardian, Captain Peggy Carter, Agatha Harkness, Shang-Chi, Storm the Goddess of Thunder, and numerous others. 

Episodes are directed by Bryan Andrews and Stephan Franck and are written by Matthew
title: Marvel Animation’s What If...? Season 3 - Official 'No Powers' Clip (2024) Hayley Atwell

author: IGN
description:
Yellow paint in games isn’t a new complaint, but the last couple of years have seen it rise to prominence. Both yellow paint in Resident Evil 4 and FF7 Rebirth (Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth) stoked the online debate, with everyone from your average gamers to AAA developers getting involved. Because the trope of using lashings of yellow paint to guide players had been well and truly highlighted, I wrongly assumed that we’d likely seen the end of it. That was until I began playing A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead and Stalker 2 and they were covered in yellow muck telling me where to go.

Why is this still happening? How have we got here? I needed answers from someone who knew exactly why developers turn to games yellow paint time and time again. I got in touch with a lead UI Designer to help make sense of this yellow madness and hopefully provide an alternative solution to the glossy paint assault.

#Gaming #Games #GameDesign
title: Yellow Paint in Video Games Needs to Stop

author: IGN
title: It's time to cut the Xbox price
